name: 100 Second Skirmish
description:
100 SECOND SKIRMISH

100 Second Skirmish is a clean, beautiful, visual experience in which you must skirmish through a course, aiming to complete in 100 Seconds or less. This is my second game in Unity, but for this one I did all the scripting by myself so this is my first real unity Game. Please feedback on this so I can improve and redevelop this, as I like the concept. Thank you <3 - Trollbae

This was developed in around 4 hours, but I do plan to update this as I sharpen my C# Skills. ( Sorry :/ ). Please give me feedback in the comments as I cant efficently playtest as a developer,  but thank you!

Also, if you enjoyed this, then im sure you will enjoy TV189. My first game published to steam that releases November 30th 2018. Here is a link to it.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/976230/

It is an adventure-action-horror game in which you must battle mutants and hostiles in a post apocalyptic world that has been plauged by the TV189 virus. Before I released this I did preview some of the chapters on my itch.io page, so be sure to follow me to keep updated.
Thank you!
